section.title: Required User Roles
section.p: Only users with the assigned role SECURITY_ADMIN have access to User Management application.

conbody.section:
Documentation
It is expected that you are familiar with the following documents:
ENM Security System Administrator Guide, 2/1543-AOM 901 151.
ENM Identity and Access Management System Administrator Guide, 2/1543-AOM 901 151-1.
ENM System Security Configuration Programmers Guide, 1/19817-CNA 403 3065.
ENM Security Management Troubleshooting Guide, 1/159 01-AOM 901 151-4.
The documents are available in the ENM CPI Library, EN/LZN 703 0205.
